QuestData.Title: Just Trying to Kill Some Bugs
QuestData.Description: Now it's time for my plan to go into full effect. We've got the captured bug strapped up with as many explosives as it can carry, and with Soothfancy's mostly amazing mental powers, we're gonna drive that sucker straight down into the center of the underground hive.$B$BAnd then...BOOM! No more bugs!$B$BYou get the personal honor of directin' the ugly thing. Go talk to Narain and get set up with your bug-pal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Narain Soothfancy to pilot the Mind-Controlled Swarmer into the Gaping Chasm hive.
QuestData.CompletionText: I didn't hear no cave-ins, pal! Try again!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh man, that was awesome! You should've seen the flames coming out of the hive!$B$BHere's your reward, for entertaining me as much as for clearing the hive!
